channel.title: ubuntu on 代码如歌
channel.description: Recent content in ubuntu on 代码如歌

item.title: image-webpack-loader resolve jpg file wrong in ubuntu server
item.description: In my production Ubuntu server which version is 16.04.3 LTS,after push my code to it,I run yarn prod but it show me a error notice ERROR in ./resources/assets/js/mobile/pages/Home/images/banner-oath.jpg Module build failed: Error: write EPIPE at _errnoException (util.js:992:11) at WriteWrap.afterWrite [as oncomplete] (net.js:864:14) after search by google,this link solve my problem install libpng16-dev in server sudo apt-get install libpng16-dev then, it is all fine.
